relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: RealVideo, Version 10
description: File format for video streaming.  In RealNetworks literature, version 9 is differentiated from version 10 only in terms of coding efficiency; this description applies to both.
